name: The Dollmaker's Shop
description:
This game was created for Devtalk's Spooktober Jam 2022.

-----

You're a lone soul, having just woken up in a new world you have never seen before, with one task; to find a vessel. Luckily, there is a wizard in town who can help you do just that... But on an unfortunate time limit. Enjoy this short yet atmospheric visual novel, and discover its various endings! 

-----

This was a solo project. Coding, art and writing was all done by Umbrores @ Sycamore Nest

Free to use pictures from www.pexels.com were used to create the backgrounds

Free music from www.soundimage.org and https://opengameart.org/ (further details and credits are given in-game)

-----

With enough feedback, we will optimize the game, increase its length and add more assets after the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam has ended.
